Text: Couldn't figure out how to play the original .. the main campaign is the soviet assault
uninstall it and reinstall it and check the UNLOCKED LEVELS at the bottom of the install list, it unlocks the levels from the original campaign, and gives you the soviet campaign as well.
Thanks TimeBomb it worked, but is it possible to play online? thank u
